title: Bacteria could become a future source of electricity

title_detail.value: Bacteria could become a future source of electricity

summary: In recent years, researchers have tried to capture the electrical current that bacteria generate through their own metabolism. So far, however, the transfer of the current from the bacteria to a receiving electrode has not been efficient at all. Now, researchers have achieved a slightly more efficient transfer of electrical current.
